column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Their crust is so crispy and the butter they put on it puts it over the top
column2: besides the fact of how it amazes me that is holds up with the massive deep dish that sits on top it.  I love the sauce
column3: I love everything about this pizza.  It's the perfect pizza
column4: it is probably a good thing I don't live near one because I would be on a first name basis with the staff if I did...
